items.title: IDP Software Vendors
items.content_html: This section contains information about various vendors that provide IDP (Intelligent Document Processing) software solutions.

items.title: Handl
items.content_html: Handl provides AI-powered document processing solutions that help organizations automate data extraction from complex documents and streamline their document workflows.

items.title: Hypatos
items.content_html: Hypatos provides AI-powered document processing solutions that automate data extraction from financial and business documents, helping organizations streamline their operations and reduce manual effort.

items.title: iManage
items.content_html: iManage provides document and knowledge management solutions that help professionals securely create, manage, and collaborate on their work product in the context of their business.

items.title: TCG Process
items.content_html: TCG Process provides intelligent document processing and business process automation solutions that help organizations transform document-centric workflows through AI-powered technologies.

items.title: Intelligent Document Processing
items.content_html: Welcome to the collaborative homepage on Intelligent Document Processing. This homepage centralizes technologies, vendors, capabilities, and advanced research in the field.

items.title: Data Extraction
items.content_html: Data extraction is the process of retrieving structured information from documents, turning unstructured or semi-structured content into organized, usable data.

items.title: Natural Language Processing
items.content_html: Natural Language Processing (NLP) in document understanding encompasses technologies that analyze, interpret, and derive meaning from textual content in documents.

items.title: Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
items.content_html: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) is the technology that converts different types of documents, such as scanned paper documents, PDF files, or images, into editable and searchable data.

items.title: Quality and Verification
items.content_html: Quality and Verification encompasses the technologies and processes that ensure the accuracy, reliability, and trustworthiness of document processing outputs through validation, error detection, and human oversight.

items.title: Document Segmentation
items.content_html: Document segmentation is the process of dividing a document into meaningful regions and identifying their types, creating a structural understanding of the document layout.

items.title: Visual Elements - Layout Analysis
items.content_html: Visual elements processing is the technology that identifies, analyzes, and interprets non-textual visual components in documents, including charts, diagrams, logos, signatures, and mathematical formulas.

items.title: Contribution Guide
items.content_html: Thank you for your interest in contributing to the IDP Software documentation! This guide will help you understand how to add content, structure your contributions, and submit them for review.

items.title: A2iA
items.content_html: A2iA (now part of Mitek Systems) is a provider of specialized intelligent document recognition and processing software. The company focuses on handwriting recognition, text extraction, and document classification technologies.

items.title: ABBYY
items.content_html: ABBYY is a global provider of intelligent document processing, content AI, and language solutions. The company is known for its advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology and document capture solutions.

items.title: AIIM (Association for Intelligent Information Management)
items.content_html: AIIM is a global non-profit organization that provides education, research, and certification programs to information professionals. While not a traditional IDP vendor, AIIM plays a crucial role in the IDP ecosystem by providing standards, best practices, and professional development for intelligent information management.

items.title: Apache PDFBox
items.content_html: Apache PDFBox is an open-source Java library for working with PDF documents. While not a traditional IDP vendor, it provides essential functionality for PDF manipulation and text extraction that serves as a foundation for many document processing solutions.

items.title: Archiv-IT
items.content_html: Archiv-IT is a specialized provider of document digitization, archiving, and management solutions, with a focus on secure and compliant document processing.

items.title: Aurexus
items.content_html: Aurexus is a provider of business process automation and document processing solutions, focusing on digital transformation and intelligent automation.

items.title: Chartpixel
items.content_html: Chartpixel is an innovative data visualization platform that transforms complex data into interactive, engaging charts and graphs, making it easier for businesses to communicate insights and make data-driven decisions.
